long_description: When you want to make camp feel more like home, the soft Therm-a-Rest Fitted Sheet fits snugly over most Therm-a-Rest(R) mattresses to give you a more luxurious and restful outdoor experience. Elasticized hem and bottom straps fit easily over your mattress. Brushed fabric is soft against the skin. Snaps mate with the Therm-a-Rest Tech(TM) Blanket or Ventra(TM) Down Comforter or with another mattress-and-sheet combo for a double bed. Offers an added layer of protection for your mattress. Therm-a-Rest Fitted Sheet is machine-washable for easy care. Closeout.
short_description: When you want to make camp feel more like home, the soft Therm-a-Rest Fitted Sheet fits snugly over most Therm-a-Rest(R) mattresses to give you a more luxurious and restful outdoor experience.
